entries.title: Side Projects
entries.body:
* Recorded and wrote summary for 3rd video in EmberMap Storybook series
* Deployed a placeholder for [darindoria.com](darindoria.com) using Vercel
* Started sketching out UI for work journal

entries.title: Learnings
entries.body:
* Found out about the `i` selector in CSS for case insensitive attribute matching  [Link](https://alvaromontoro.com/blog/67839/case-insensitive-selectors-in-css)
* Started using Next.js - super straight forward
* First time using React since hooks were announced - hooks take some getting used to
